description:
OverviewThis Mini-HDMI to HDMI cable delivers both HD video and digital audio from 
portable devices with an HDMI Type C connector to an HDTV or Projector with a 
full size HDMI Type A port.*3D-Support: Works for true 3D gaming and 
3D home theater applications*4K-Support: Video Resolutions up to 4096 x 2048*HDMI Ethernet Channel(HEC): 
Adds full-duplex 100 Mbps Ethernet networking to an HDMI link*Audio Return Channel(ARC): Transfers audio in both directions. Listen 
to HDTV audio on a surround sound system*Content Type Support: Enables a display to auto-select the appropriate 
mode to match the content profile for games, videos, photos, or text.*Color Spaces: Supports RGB color and x.v.Color with added support for 
sYCC601 color, Adobe RGB color and Adobe YCC601 colorSpecifications* Input:     Mini-HDMI Typ C 19 pin - Male* Output:  HDMI Typ A 19 pin - Male* Supports DVD Audio, SACD, TrueHD and DTS-HD* Supports Deep Color up to 16 Bits per channel (RGB oder YCbCr)* Supports 225MHz/2.25 Gbps per channel (6,75 Gbps all channels)* Supports Bandwidth up to 340 MHz (10.2 Gbps) Bandwidth* Supported Resolutions: Up to 4096 x 2048* Supports uncompressed digital LPCM 7.1, 5.1 or 2 channels and compressed 
digital Bit-Stream audio* 100% Bare Copper Conductors (No CCS)* Wire Gauge: 30 AWG* RoHS compliantImportant Note:Check your device connections! This is NOT a USB cable or a Micro-HDMI cable used 
with a phone.The HDMI Ethernet Channel will only function on HEC enabled devices.
title: Cable Matters High Speed Mini-HDMI (Typ C) to HDMI (Typ A) Cable 3D & 4K Resolution Ready with Ethernet - 3 Feet
